verses.verse: Now while Ezra<WH5830> prayed<WH6419> and made confession,<WH3034> weeping<WH1058> and casting himself down<WH5307> before<WH6440> the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> there was gathered<WH6908> together to him out of Israel<WH3478> a very<WH3966> great<WH7227> assembly<WH6951> of men<WH582> and women<WH802> and children;<WH3206> for the people<WH582> wept<WH1058> very<WH7235> bitterly.<WH1059>

Shecaniah<WH7935> the son<WH1121> of Jehiel,<WH3171> one of the sons<WH1121> of Elam,<WH5867> answered<WH6030> Ezra,<WH5830> "We<WH559> have trespassed<WH4603> against our God,<WH430> and have married<WH3427> foreign<WH5237> women<WH802> of the peoples<WH5971> of the land.<WH776> Yet now there is<WH3426> hope<WH4723> for Israel concerning this thing.<WH3478>

Now therefore let us make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with our God<WH430> to put away<WH3318> all the wives,<WH802> and such as are born<WH3205> of them,<WH6098> according to the counsel of my lord,<WH136> and of those who tremble<WH2730> at the commandment<WH4687> of our God.<WH430> Let it be done<WH6213> according to the law.<WH8451>
Arise;<WH6965> for the matter<WH1697> belongs to you,<WH2388> and we are with you. Be courageous, and do it.<WH6213>"

Then Ezra<WH5830> arose,<WH6965> and made the chiefs<WH8269> of the priests,<WH3548> the Levites,<WH3881> and all Israel,<WH3478> to swear<WH7650> that they would do<WH6213> according to this word.<WH1697> So they swore.<WH7650>

Then Ezra<WH5830> rose up<WH6965> from before<WH6440> the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> and went<WH3212> into the room<WH3957> of Jehohanan<WH3076> the son<WH1121> of Eliashib:<WH475> and when he came<WH3212> there,<WH398> he ate no bread,<WH3899> nor drank<WH8354> water;<WH4325> for he mourned<WH56> because of their trespass<WH4604> of the captivity.<WH1473>

They made proclamation<WH5674> throughout Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem<WH3389> to all the children<WH1121> of the captivity,<WH1473> that they should gather themselves together<WH6908> to Jerusalem;<WH3389>

and that whoever didn't<WH935> come within three<WH7969> days,<WH3117> according to the counsel<WH6098> of the princes<WH8269> and the elders,<WH2205> all his substance<WH7399> should be forfeited,<WH2763> and himself separated<WH914> from the assembly<WH6951> of the captivity.<WH1473>

Then all the men<WH582> of Judah<WH3063> and Benjamin<WH1144> gathered themselves together<WH6908> to Jerusalem<WH3389> within the three<WH7969> days;<WH3117> it was the ninth<WH8671> month,<WH2320> on the twentieth<WH6242> day of the month:<WH2320> and all the people<WH5971> sat<WH3427> in the broad<WH7339> place before the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> trembling<WH7460> because of this matter,<WH1697> and for the great rain.<WH1653>

Ezra<WH5830> the priest<WH3548> stood up,<WH6965> and said<WH559> to them,<WH4603> "You have trespassed, and have married<WH3427> foreign<WH5237> women,<WH802> to increase<WH3254> the guilt<WH819> of Israel.<WH3478>

Now therefore make<WH5414> confession<WH8426> to Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of your fathers,<WH1> and do<WH6213> his pleasure;<WH7522> and separate<WH914> yourselves from the peoples<WH5971> of the land,<WH776> and from the foreign<WH5237> women.<WH802>"
Then all the assembly<WH6951> answered<WH6030> with<WH559> a loud<WH1419> voice,<WH6963> "As you have said<WH559> concerning us,<WH6213> so must we do.

But<WH61> the people<WH5971> are many,<WH7227> and it is a time<WH6256> of much rain,<WH1653> and we are not able<WH3581> to stand<WH5975> outside;<WH2351> neither is this a work<WH4399> of one<WH259> day<WH3117> or two;<WH8147> for we<WH7235> have greatly transgressed<WH6586> in this matter.<WH1697>

Let now our princes<WH8269> be appointed<WH5975> for all the assembly,<WH6951> and let all those who are in our cities<WH5892> who have married<WH3427> foreign<WH5237> women<WH802> come<WH935> at appointed<WH2163> times,<WH6256> and with them the elders<WH2205> of every city,<WH5892> and its judges,<WH8199> until the fierce<WH2740> wrath<WH639> of our God<WH430> be turned<WH7725> from us,<WH1697> until this matter is resolved."

Only Jonathan<WH3129> the son<WH1121> of Asahel<WH6214> and Jahzeiah<WH3167> the son<WH1121> of Tikvah<WH8616> stood<WH5975> up against this;<WH4918> and Meshullam and Shabbethai<WH7678> the Levite<WH3881> helped them.<WH5826>

The children<WH1121> of the captivity<WH1473> did so.<WH6213> Ezra<WH5830> the priest,<WH3548> with certain<WH582> heads<WH7218> of fathers<WH1>' households,<WH1> after their fathers' houses,<WH1004> and all of them by their names,<WH8034> were set apart;<WH914> and they sat down<WH3427> in the first<WH259> day<WH3117> of the tenth<WH6224> month<WH2320> to examine<WH1875> the matter.<WH1697>
They made an end<WH3615> with all the men<WH582> who had married<WH3427> foreign<WH5237> women<WH802> by the first<WH259> day<WH3117> of the first<WH259> month.<WH2320>

Among the sons<WH1121> of the priests<WH3548> there were found<WH4672> who had married<WH3427> foreign<WH5237> women:<WH802> of the sons<WH1121> of Jeshua,<WH3442> the son<WH1121> of Jozadak,<WH3136> and his brothers,<WH251> Maaseiah,<WH4641> and Eliezer,<WH461> and Jarib,<WH3402> and Gedaliah.<WH1436>
They gave<WH5414> their hand<WH3027> that they would put away<WH3318> their wives;<WH802> and being guilty,<WH818> they offered a ram<WH352> of the flock<WH6629> for their guilt.<WH819>
Of the sons<WH1121> of Immer:<WH564> Hanani<WH2607> and Zebadiah.<WH2069>
Of the sons<WH1121> of Harim:<WH2766> Maaseiah,<WH4641> and Elijah,<WH452> and Shemaiah,<WH8098> and Jehiel,<WH3171> and Uzziah.<WH5818>

Of the singers:<WH7891> Eliashib.<WH475> Of the porters:<WH7778> Shallum,<WH7967> and Telem,<WH2928> and Uri.<WH221>

Of the sons<WH1121> of Zattu:<WH2240> Elioenai,<WH454> Eliashib,<WH475> Mattaniah,<WH4983> and Jeremoth,<WH3406> and Zabad,<WH2066> and Aziza.<WH5819>

Of the sons<WH1121> of Harim:<WH2766> Eliezer,<WH461> Isshijah,<WH3449> Malchijah,<WH4441> Shemaiah,<WH8098> Shimeon,<WH8095>
Benjamin,<WH1144> Malluch,<WH4409> Shemariah.<WH8114>

Benaiah,<WH1141> Bedeiah,<WH912> Cheluhi,<WH3622>
Vaniah,<WH2057> Meremoth,<WH4822> Eliashib,<WH475>
Mattaniah,<WH4983> Mattenai,<WH4982> and Jaasu,<WH3299>
and Bani,<WH1137> and Binnui,<WH1131> Shimei,<WH8096>
and Shelemiah,<WH8018> and Nathan,<WH5416> and Adaiah,<WH5718>
Machnadebai,<WH4367> Shashai,<WH8343> Sharai,<WH8298>
Azarel,<WH5832> and Shelemiah,<WH8018> Shemariah,<WH8114>
Shallum,<WH7967> Amariah,<WH568> Joseph.<WH3130>

All these had taken<WH5375> foreign<WH5237> wives;<WH802> and some of them had<WH3426> wives<WH802> by whom they had<WH7760> children.<WH1121>
